title: Hanukkah lamp
description: moulded design with animal and architectural forms in openwork on back; 2 birds on back corners; grids on sides; Holiday Traditions, Judaica
provenance: (Weisberg Religious Articles, New York); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased June 1978; Gift to the MIA in 2001.
creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
